segments.text: I notice the woman’s dress swaying slightly as she moves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so absorbed in her task, blissfully unaware of the chaos unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost maddening how she can ignore the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a rush of irritation that she doesn’t see the danger around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is teetering dangerously on that stool, and yet she continues to polish her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is admirable, but at what cost?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the determination in the boy’s eyes; he wants those cookies badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him looks so eager, just waiting for a taste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a sweet moment, but it feels overshadowed by imminent danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope someone notices the peril before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
